DOC.brief_summary: The investigator hypothesize that vytorin may improve vascular and insulin resistance in hypercholesterolemic patients
DOC.brief_title: Vascular and Metabolic Effects of Vytorin
DOC.criteria: hypercholesterolemia overt liver disease, chronic renal failure, hypothyroidism, myopathy, uncontrolled diabetes (HbA1c > 9%), severe hypertension, stroke, acute coronary events, coronary revascularization within the preceding 3 months, or alcohol abuse
